Shhadai:
The La Vie En Rose's Radiant Brooch activates 5 jewel slots, but it can't be made that easily. I need 30 Shiny Gemstone Fragments and 1 Radiant Gemstone Fragment.
Bring me any Jewel Box or a Lv. 1 Jewel, and I'll give you a Radiant Gemstone Fragment.
You can get Shiny Gemstone Fragments from Shadai's Jewelry Box at a low rate.
If you bring all the ingredients, I'll make a La Vie En Rose's Radiant Brooch for you.
